title: Exceptionally scary
review: Clowns are funny, they said. Nope, not funny. These two hours in the Imax were even more horrible than rope-jumping from the 45-meter tower (and that was something, believe me). This was the scariest movie I've ever seen! Oh, one more thing: don't forget to visit the toilet BEFORE watching this movie!

title: Awful movie
review: The only purpose of this movie is the chance for those with huge ego to say 'I understood this movie'
